Golfview Golf Course Information
Welcome to Golfview Golf Course
We are a 9-hole executive course with 9 great par-threes.
The course is situated on 15
beautifully manicured
acres
including two lakes.
The clubhouse and pro shop are located
at
14849 Hole in One Circle, Fort Myers, FL  33919.
We know you'll be challenged on every shot
and that you WILL be back for more.
Looking forward to seeing you and your playing partners soon.
Call (239) 489-2264 for TeeTimes.
Glenn Haugsjaa
Director of Golf
(239) 823-5580
